thread.title: Chelsea defender Abdul Baba Rahman makes his first English Premier League
thread.title_full: Chelsea defender Abdul Baba Rahman makes his first English Premier League

title: Chelsea defender Abdul Baba Rahman makes his first English Premier League
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 17:25 CET Chelsea defender Abdul Baba Rahman makes his first English Premier League - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana defender Baba Rahman made his first start in the English Premier League as he was in Chelsea’s starting line-up in their must-win game against Aston Villa on Saturday. 
The left-back joined the Blues two months ago from German side Augsburg but he had not played for the English side in their Premier League matches before Saturday’s game 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
